Take your pick. Rush's hoodie performance was intentional encouragement for his brother Black Panthers, for blacks everywhere, and for all other anti-Americans, to ratchet up their Acts of violence. Blacks have been Itching for this ever since the 1970's.
P.S. Why are there still white and/or conservatives (here and abroad) voicing shock and disappointment that the black Muslim U.S. president is fueling anti-American activities on the soil of the Republic which he swore to protect? Well .... when he is re-elected in November and then begins to cut loose with the final actions to extinguish our Republic and Constitution, maybe then youall will get the point.
Lord, come quickly.
